column3: Approach ACK. `AC_DEFINE` will always define the pre-processor symbol.

ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16344/commits/976b034b13d28877aee641833d5ee28a8cc5d83f.\n\nPerhaps (in another PR/issue) we should make sure that for other preprocessor symbols we _**mean**_ `define(FOOBAR)` when we say it. @fanquake does that sound reasonable?
